author: Special Correspondent
M Soundariya Preetha
text:
Inaugurated

Department of Posts inaugurated its second ATM in Coimbatore division on Wednesday. It plans to set up 86 ATMs in the State and 16 are already in operation in the western region. Core Banking Solution is available at all post offices and as part of core banking, the post office savings bank ATM was opened at RS Puram Head Post Office on Wednesday, according to a press release.
title: TAMIL NADU
